SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT a.* ,ROWNUM num FROM( SELECT A.TREATMENTCODE campaign_mang_code ,A.CELLID cellid ,'E.CELLNAME' cellnm ,A.PACKAGEID packageid ,B.CAMPAIGNCODE campaigncode ,D.CAMPAIGN_NM campaignname ,C.TITLE title ,C.MSG msg ,C.LINK_URL link_url ,C.MSG_DESC msg_desc ,C.DISP_TYPE disp_type ,C.DISP_RNK disp_rnk ,TO_CHAR(C.DISP_BGN_DY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') disp_bgn_dy ,TO_CHAR(C.DISP_END_DY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') disp_end_dy ,C.EVNT_TYP_CD evnt_typ_cd ,(SELECT CODE_ID FROM CM_CODE_DTL WHERE COMM_CODE_ID = 'C007' AND CODE_ID = C.EVNT_TYP_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) evnt_typ_nm ,C.USE_YN use_yn ,C.SYNC_YN sync_yn ,C.CREATE_NO create_no ,(SELECT USER_NAME FROM CM_USER WHERE ID = C.CREATE_NO) create_nm ,TO_CHAR(C.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') create_dt ,C.UPDATE_NO update_no ,(SELECT USER_NAME FROM CM_USER WHERE ID = C.UPDATE_NO) update_nm ,TO_CHAR(C.UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') update_dt ,ROWNUM row_num FROM CM_CHANNEL_TRANS A ,CM_EXTRACT_INFO B ,DP_TOAST_MSG_MSTR_SRC C ,CI_CAMPAIGN D
WHERE A.CHANNEL_CD = 'TOAST' AND A.CELLID = B.CELLID /*AND A.PACKAGEID = B.PACKAGEID*/ AND A.TREATMENTCODE = C.CAMPAIGN_MANG_CODE AND B.CAMPAIGNCODE = D.CAMPAIGN_CD(+)
AND B.CAMPAIGNCODE LIKE '%'||#{SCAMPAIGNCODE}||'%'
AND #{SDISP_BGN_DY} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(C.DISP_BGN_DY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(C.DISP_END_DY, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY CREATE_DT DESC )a )a
WHERE num >= #{searchRangeStart} AND num <= #{searchRangeEnd} ORDER BY num

SELECT COUNT(0) cnt FROM CM_CHANNEL_TRANS A ,CM_EXTRACT_INFO B ,DP_TOAST_MSG_MSTR_SRC C ,CI_CAMPAIGN D WHERE A.CHANNEL_CD = 'TOAST' AND A.CELLID = B.CELLID /*AND A.PACKAGEID = B.PACKAGEID*/ AND A.TREATMENTCODE = C.CAMPAIGN_MANG_CODE AND B.CAMPAIGNCODE = D.CAMPAIGN_CD(+) AND B.CAMPAIGNCODE LIKE '%'||#{SCAMPAIGNCODE}||'%'
AND #{SDISP_BGN_DY} BETWEEN TO_CHAR(C.DISP_BGN_DY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(C.DISP_END_DY, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT A.TREATMENTCODE campaign_mang_code ,A.CELLID cellid ,''/*E.CELLNAME*/ cellnm ,A.PACKAGEID packageid ,B.CAMPAIGNCODE campaigncode ,D.CAMPAIGN_NM campaignname ,C.TITLE title ,C.MSG msg ,C.LINK_URL link_url ,C.MSG_DESC msg_desc ,C.DISP_TYPE disp_type ,C.DISP_RNK disp_rnk ,TO_CHAR(C.DISP_BGN_DY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') disp_bgn_dy ,TO_CHAR(C.DISP_END_DY, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') disp_end_dy ,C.EVNT_TYP_CD evnt_typ_cd ,(SELECT CODE_ID FROM CM_CODE_DTL WHERE COMM_CODE_ID = 'C007' AND CODE_ID = C.EVNT_TYP_CD AND USE_YN = 'Y' ) evnt_typ_nm ,C.USE_YN use_yn ,C.SYNC_YN sync_yn ,C.CREATE_NO create_no ,DECODE(C.CREATE_NO,NULL,NULL,'System') create_nm ,TO_CHAR(C.CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') create_dt ,C.UPDATE_NO update_no ,NVL((SELECT USER_NAME FROM CM_USER WHERE ID = C.UPDATE_NO),'System') update_nm ,TO_CHAR(C.UPDATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') update_dt FROM CM_CHANNEL_TRANS A ,CM_EXTRACT_INFO B ,DP_TOAST_MSG_MSTR_SRC C ,CI_CAMPAIGN D --,UA_TARGETCELLS E WHERE A.CHANNEL_CD = 'TOAST' AND A.CELLID = B.CELLID /*AND A.PACKAGEID = B.PACKAGEID*/ AND A.TREATMENTCODE = B.RUNID AND A.TREATMENTCODE = C.CAMPAIGN_MANG_CODE AND B.CAMPAIGNCODE = D.CAMPAIGN_CD(+) --AND A.CELLID = E.CELLID(+) AND C.CAMPAIGN_MANG_CODE = #{CAMPAIGN_MANG_CODE}
